headline: Feel the Love. Heal the Hate.
description: Saddle up, warrior. We're going to a rally! Join 27+ world renowned authors, activists, and researchers who are changing the dialogue around dieting and body confidence.
offer: Bring your earphones, four legged friend, and half-finished journal because you're about to sign up for a SOLID week of candid conversations and authentic advice that'll help redefine your relationship to food, body, and self.
